evidence.claim: Dynamic Design Associates utilizes AWS for cloud services and hosting.
The company adheres to HIPAA regulations for all health-related data handling.
Integration with EHR systems through API methodologies is part of their technology stack.
Dynamic Design Associates employs FHIR standards in their healthcare applications.
They are utilizing Snowflake for their data warehousing solutions.

icp.icp_reason: No relevant X12 or EDI use cases found on the website.
